page.title: 15MARLOWES, HEMEL HEMPSTEAD
page.content: In our area the{Marlowes}is the most popular street for{shopping.}It is also a part of Hemel for doing {business. {Facilities}include a library, the Pavilion (concert hall), the police station, the main Post Office, estate agents, solicitors, Civic Centre, building societies, Dacorum College, an open market and the Bus Station. The{library}isn't just for lending books. It has maps on the wall to help you and it has an information desk. The{Post Office}is very helpful too. It has a photocopying machine and a photo box. The Post Office also sells stamps for collectors. The{market}opens Thursday, Friday and Saturday. Some of the things you can buy are fruit, vegetables, plants, jewellery, toys, curtains, clothes, cutlery and tea-sets.
